name: Mobile App Login Test
description: Demonstrates AppiumLibrary detection for mobile application automation

testCases.name: Mobile App Login Flow
testCases.description: Test user login through mobile application

steps.description: Launch mobile application on Android device
steps.testData: platformName: Android, deviceName: emulator-5554, appPackage: com.example.app

steps.description: Enter username and password in mobile app form
Tap login button on mobile screen
steps.expectedResult: Mobile login button tapped and form submitted
